revised_title: The Fossil Plants of Coal-Measures: Heterangium Tiliaceoides and Kaloxylon Hookeri
tldr: The author examines the organization and structure of two fossil plants, Heterangium Tiliaceoides and Kaloxylon Hookeri, found in the coal-measures. The study focuses on their medullary axis, exogenous zone, phloem zone, and cortex, providing insights into their classification and evolution.
